00024 inline bool DRect::containsPoint(const int x, const int y) const{
00025   return ( (x>=this->x) && (x<(this->x + w)) &&
00026      (y>=this->y) && (y<(this->y + h)) );
00027 }
00028 
00029 inline bool DRect::containsPoint(const DPoint &p) const{
00030   return containsPoint(p.x, p.y);
00031 }
00032 
00033 inline bool DRect::intersectsWith(const DRect &r2) const{
00034   return ( (r2.containsPoint(this->x,this->y)) ||
00035      (this->containsPoint(r2.x,r2.y)) ||
00036      (r2.containsPoint(this->x+this->w-1,this->y)) ||
00037      (r2.containsPoint(this->x,this->y+this->h-1)) ||
00038      (r2.containsPoint(this->x+this->w-1,this->y+this->h-1)) ||
00039      (this->containsPoint(r2.x+r2.w-1, r2.y)) ||
00040      (this->containsPoint(r2.x, r2.y+r2.h-1)) ||
00041      (this->containsPoint(r2.x+r2.w-1, r2.y+r2.h-1)));
00042 }
